Queries.RegisterUser: INSERT INTO userdetail(UserName, PassWord, Role) values (@UserName, @PassWord, @Role);
Queries.UserLogin: SELECT UserId, UserName, Role from userdetail Where UserName=@UserName and PassWord=@PassWord;
Queries.AddInformation: INSERT INTO CrudApplication(UserName, EmailID, MobileNumber, Salary, Gender) VALUES (@UserName, @EmailID, @MobileNumber, @Salary, @Gender);
Queries.UpdateAllInformationById: UPDATE CrudApplication SET UserName=@UserName, EmailID=@EmailID, MobileNumber=@MobileNumber, Salary=@Salary, Gender=@Gender WHERE UserId=@UserId;
